914240.name: Nuclear Rancher
914240.description:
a nuclear-fueled RPG that encourages players to grow, collect, and mutate in order to survive.

The world is recovering from ruin, creating mutants and strange hybrids. Your father has found a sustainable water source and asked for your help to build a community from scratch.

Current Features

  • Explore a vast wasteland. Much of the world is in ruins and only you can help rebuild what was lost. By venturing out into the great unknown you can find resources that you will need to make the world what it once was.

  • Build a community from scratch. Your father has called on you to help rebuild the only town around with fresh water. The buildings are pretty run down and could use a remodel (in some cases a total overhaul!). He will guide you in the right direction and allow you to upgrade buildings and even attract new friends to your community.

  • Craft dozens of items to build your settlement! Take your community to the next level by crafting items!

  • Level up your character and your companions. The bigger and better your community is, and the more you upgrade the buildings in town, the more opportunities you will have to upgrade your character and everything else!

    Planned Features

  • Full controller support. The game will be completely playable with a mouse and keyboard, or with your XBOX controller at launch.
914240.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
